website_summaries.verdict: If suction isn’t a must-have feature, this adorable Minnie Mouse themed vacuum will deliver hours of imaginative play for little ones who love to help out around the house.
pros: Quickly and easily converts from an upright vacuum to a handheld model for versatile play
Swirling multi colored bows, sounds, and lights make for more entertaining and realistic “clean-ups”
Cute character design is bound to be a hit with any Minnie Mouse fan
cons: Some might not be impressed by the lack of suction

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy. How to make it play for more than a few seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My 2 year old loves Minnie Mouse. The height is good for her and would be for a 3 year old. I would NOT buy this if the intention is a 4 year old or older. We had the same issue as other people about the sound only working for a few moments. It didn't seem right to us. If you take the handheld piece out and check out the back, there's a switch with the choices of "try me", "on" and "off". It comes factory preset to off and if you turn it to "on" the vacuum will continue to sound as long as you're pushing it around.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. I wish they had a Mickey version or it was more neutral colors, but that's not too big of a deal. The plastic seems durable enough (not brittle like the more expensive Dyson play vac we used to have that constantly broke) and I actually like that the vacuum only makes noise when you roll it across the floor or hold down the power button constantly because it helps prolong the battery life (make sure you switch from "try me" mode to "on" mode). It is a perfect height for a 1.5-5 year old, maybe even older. Noise is not too obnoxious, and kids seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if you could turn sound on and off rather ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if you could turn sound on and off rather than having to push the button (that is not in a convenient place) to make noise that only lasts a few seconds. "Dustbuster" attachment is difficult for my 3 year old grand daughter to take off and on. She plays with it a little bit, but mostly just gets aggravated and bored with it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nell Aiken

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: All the children wanted a turn at my granddaughter's party. I had read peoples comments about the sounds not staying on - there's a trick to that, remove the portable vacuum part and on the back switch the button from "try me" to "on" - then whenever they are actually moving the vacuum the sounds continue. This is a very cute toy, just hope it keeps her interest for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: aslan50mac

customer_reviews.title: 19 month old favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum for our 19 month old and she absolutely loves playing with it. It stands on its' own and has a removable "duster vac" so she can play with that piece separately when she wants. The pretend vacuum noise and wind tunnel movements sounds like the real thing. Stays on for about 5 seconds with each push of the button so not obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wolfgramm

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is so awesome. My daughter has been showing an interest in our real vacuum so I bought her this. It’s the perfect height and all she has to do is push it around and it makes the whizzing sound and the pieces float around inside like a real vacuum. Not to mention, it’s cute. Don’t forget to switch the button from “Try me” to “On” and you’re all set.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderA

customer_reviews.title: Love her vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love her new Vacuum cleaner lol everythime i clean the carpet she get her vacuum
customer_reviews.author: ABIGAIL

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her 2nd birthday and loves to help me "vacuum" the house. The only thing that bothers her is that she has to be moving the vacuum on the floor for it to make any noises. I think it is cute and stable. I do wish that this one had a hose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves to help me clean (hopefully this sticks with her when she’s actually old enough to help) and she always goes for her vacuum whenever I’m vacuuming. The only bad thing about this toy is that it doesn’t stay on. You have to keep moving it or it turns off and then you have to push the button again, which is aggravating to a 2 year old. She’s kind of gotten the hang of it though over the 6 months we have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my youngest granddaughter, but most of the kids were taking turns with it. I thought the noise was going to put her off a bit, but she really seemed to enjoy it. Seems very sturdy. Easy to turn on, easy to get it to tilt back. The "dustbuster" comes out a little hard, but once you realize that you aren't going to brake something, then it's easy for an adult to do, a bit more difficult for a child. Overall though, great toy.
customer_reviews.author: timturk

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter is terrified of vacuums. I bought this to try to help her overcome her fear. It helped, somewhat. She is still afraid. But, as for the product, I really like it. I like that it has 2 parts. It is very well made. She uses it quite a bit. It turns off too soon, however, and she gets frustrated with that. But, I realize that is for the sake of the parents!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Hammell

customer_reviews.title: Super FRUSTRATING Toy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. It’s very cute... BUT... The vacuum sound only lasts for a few seconds. Even when you change the setting from “try me” to “on” (pull out hand vac part to change setting), the vacuum sound only works sometimes when the vacuum is being pushed. We have both hard wood floors and carpet. It doesn’t matter the surface, the vacuum does not stay “on”. If they made an option for it to truly stay on when the button is pushed this toy would be amazing. As is, my poor little girl gets super excited and then frustrated because she has to keep pushing the button every 2 seconds. GRRR 😡
customer_reviews.author: H. G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for the few days it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas this year. She loved it and it worked perfectly when we first opened it. Now a few days after Christmas it has quit working. It no longer makes noise or spins the butterflies around in the vacuum. The lights still flash but that's it. We've changed the batteries and still get the same outcome. So bummed!
customer_reviews.author: mommyO4

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. When this arrived, I thought it was so cute!!! My daughter opened it from Santa this morning and it didn't work anymore. No problem--so we changed the batteries and it will light up, but no sounds or anything else. I'm so embarrassed as she doesn't understand why it's not working.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H

customer_reviews.title: So cute, but no suction.
customer_reviews.text: At 5 yrs old my little is still playing with this vacuum. You can remove the middle and use it as a Dustbuster just like our real vacuum. It make real suction noises too. Only downfall is there there is no suction at all. Overall, I still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: The part of the toy that lights up and bows fluttering could have stayed on longer (maybe have an on/off bottom). It only stays on for seconds and my daughter keep reaching down to push the button every five seconds. This was kind of annoying so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Update on my previous review
customer_reviews.text: My previous review....I got this for my 20 mo old granddaughter. It's cute but it doesn't sound like a vacuum for more than a few seconds then it turns off. My update...She is now 2 and she loves her vacuum. I've noticed that as long as she is pushing it, the sound stays on. She goes around vacuuming our whole house and the sound stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, good quality, but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cute. The lights and the little swirling Minnie “dust bunnies” are adorable. It also seems to be really good quality. My only complaint with this toy is it is so loud. And it only does one thing (lights up and makes a vacuum noise). Thankfully there is an off button, but if you’re one that is easily annoyed by loud toys, you might want to rethink this one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wright

customer_reviews.title: Even my little boys think this is fun. If your kids love to help you vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas, and she loves it! It makes a really cute noise, and there are cute little bows that fly around inside when "using" it. You can also detach the middle for a small hand vacuum. Even my little boys think this is fun. If your kids love to help you vacuum, this is the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3minions

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grand daughter and she couldn't be happier to 'help' momma with the housework ;-) Seller was spot on with description, delivery, etc. Would recommend seller/product
customer_reviews.author: Jeri H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum noise only lasts a few seconds and is frustrating for my 2 year old, she wants the sound to last like a real vacuum. Other than that, it's adorable and a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old had been asking for this for awhile but I was balking at the price. We ended up purchasing it for her birthday and she absolutely loves it! She’s played with it constantly for over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Oberfell

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these ... one for each of the toddlers in my life. The vacuum only makes noise for a few seconds and then stops. I thought it was a defect but all three vacuums do it! Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict78

customer_reviews.title: the only thing I don't like is that the dust buster falls off every once ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves vacuuming with me so we got her her own little vacuum. she loves it! the only thing I don't like is that the dust buster falls off every once in a while. otherwise everything else is great. I wish it would actually suck up, because our house would be spotless with how often she uses this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Minnie & she had to have this vacuum! It’s cute, but the only thing she doesn’t like about it, is that it doesn’t stay on very long at all. There’s a try me & an on switch & you’d think it would stay on longer in the on position, but it’s the same for both:(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noise stopped
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing! My only complaint is that it’s supposed to make the “vacuum noise” when the wheels turn but that already quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Polich

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and the sound effect is nice too
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and the sound effect is nice too, but the upper portion tends to fall down and doesnt want to stay in the upright position for too long. For that reason I gave it a 3-out-of-5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 2 year old. A year later, she still loves it! It is well made and I would highly recommend this product. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item doesn't work-item was not new
customer_reviews.text: The item doesn't work. When I opened the box, the item was in original box but the item was not a new item. The plastic holding the item in was already cut so the item was not secure in the box. The handle was already attached. Original batteries were not in it. The sound does not work only the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Frevert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece who is a Minnie fan. She loves it and just is so happy helping mommy & daddy clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this the other day for my granddaughter for Christmas. I’m sure she’s going to love it. I pushed the button on the outside of the box and seems like it’s going to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: The button that shows what they've 'vacuumed' only stays on for about 3 seconds. Prepare for a frustrated kiddo.
customer_reviews.text: The button that shows what they've 'vacuumed' only stays on for about 3 seconds. It was shutting off as quickly as she could stand up and hold the handle...frustrating her to no end and leading to tears from our birthday girl. FAIL. Returning it for one that will stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: My daughter had to kept manually pushing the button over and over just to enjoy the sound
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. The sound of the vacuum doesn’t last too long. My daughter had to kept manually pushing the button over and over just to enjoy the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this Minnie vacuum! She loves to pretend she's vacuuming the carpet with me. It's sturdy and great quality, it's cute and fun. Part of it also detaches for a little hand vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 1 year old who loves the way the vacuum sounds so I wanted to get her one that sounded similar to a regular vacuum. This is really close but not as loud which is perfect because you can't hear it from the other room. She loves that it lights up too! Her brothers are 5 and 7 and love playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my granddaughter! Only problem was the handbag made the noise and everyone wanted it to make noise all the time she was moving the standup portion!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Which is fine I suppose it will save on batteries
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves the vacuum, the only thing it doesn't stay running but for only about 15 seconds. Unless you take off the hand held part and hold in the button yourself. Which is fine I suppose it will save on batteries. My grand daughter doesn't seem to care!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, colorful and ez to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Make believe Floor Vac with automatic start of sound when pushed. Removable Hand Vac with push on sound. Butterflys swirl in see through “dust collector”.
customer_reviews.author: Recently there

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I though my two year old would really enjoy this, but she hasn't played with it once. I like that the hand vacuum detaches, but I wish the button for the sound was on the main vacuum handle. I also wish the sound lasted a lot longer. It only runs for a few seconds. Definitely not worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cook

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: Cute but hard to get it to work properly on hardwood floors. It's not that stable either unless propped against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! My 2 year old love it! Makes sounds like a vacuum and lights up.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 22 month old loves “helping” me clean with this vacume.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: She still loved it but the thing didn't twinkle or make noise ...
customer_reviews.text: Was broken when we got it. She still loved it but the thing didn't twinkle or make noise of any kind :(
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughters first birthday in Jan. Lasted about 4 months, was a hit with her but noise doesn't last long while using and the vacuum only makes the sound while the attachment is on. Now even with new batteries the vacuum doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ney

customer_reviews.title: a little dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES this and uses it regularly however day 1 the noise and lights quit working. Despite all of our efforts it just doesn't light up or make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minnie vacuum great kids toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Cute and girly, my daughter loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra C. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers like it. Kinda pricey for what you get though.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Donley

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to pretend to help grandma clean
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to help clean the house, and now she can. It makes a little noise just like a vacuum and looks like it's picking up butterflies while pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves using this! Whenever anyone gets out the vacumn she has hera going too!

customer_reviews.title: sound button in bad spot and doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: it’s disappointing that the sound doesn’t stay on. wouldn’t have bought if i knew this. wish i read more into it

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: LITERALLY BROKE WITHIN 5 MINUTES OF MY NIECE USING IT.
customer_reviews.author: kampers

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2-year old for Xmas. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie MB

customer_reviews.title: Noise doesn't stay on but for maybe 5 seconds
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter likes the vacuum but gets frustrated that the noise doesn't stay on. She has to push the button every 5 seconds to get the noise again so she can't just vacuum and have the noise stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in it
customer_reviews.text: This toy vacuum is very cheaply made. It makes a vacuum sound when you push the button for a very short time (less than 10 seconds) if it works at all. I was disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: chris bauman

customer_reviews.title: Was a Christmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product that made all the grandchildren happy. Could have used several more! Service was great and delivered exactly as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: It was just ok. My 2 yo granddaughter liked it. Wish the motor would stay on longer than 5 seconds though.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is the best. Makes noise which my daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is the best. Makes noise which my daughter loves. The front comes off to be a small vacuum that my daughter loves taking off and vacuuming small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Cherielynn E.

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER LOVES TO COPY ME SO I BOUGHT THIS FOR HER TO THINK SHES CLEANING THE HOUSE WITH ME. SHE LOVES THEM!
customer_reviews.author: ROSE MARIE

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 2/3 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two year old! We had the fisher price vacuum and she loved it but she outgrew it and this is perfect between the colors, Minnie, the sounds and perfect height!

customer_reviews.title: Its cute and size appropriate for a 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and size appropriate for a 2 year old, however the sound activation is so short that the child is frustrated and tries to get it to work longer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have ordered something else

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Switch to "ON" mode for best play
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loved it and kept playing with it while in the packaging (supposed to be a gift but couldn't wait). I was about to get very frustrated with it not staying on until I read another review of switching from "try me" to "on". Phew!! I would have returned had I not known this. Now it's perfect and she's obsessed!!
customer_reviews.author: David2978

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!  All of the little ones loved it and the pull out hand vac.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loved this! It was her favorite birthday toy.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. She even made a special place to store it in the kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for Christmas. The inside piece that makes the toy make noise is broke so noiseless vacuum cleaner unless youre constantly hitting the demo button. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this gift! It works great and she follows behind me when I vacuum!

customer_reviews.title: Needs to have the sound stay on longer than it does.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a birthday gift for a 2 year old. She loved it!

customer_reviews.title: So fun for 3 yo niece
customer_reviews.text: she loves it and it so cute to see the little confetti spin when the vacuum is running

customer_reviews.title: Defective item. Batteries leaked and ruined the toy.
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the package we noticed that thee batteries rotted and the acid leaked and ruined the area around the battery holder. We will have to return the item.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby girls vacuums in one hand and eats her snack in the other.

customer_reviews.text: Easy plug in batteries and let your little one have fun pretending to vacuum. Great way to introduce them to cleaning lol

product_meta.title: Minnie Happy Helpers 2-in-1 Play Vacuum
product_meta.description: Minnie Mouse's Twinkle Bows Vacuum makes cleaning not only fun, but fabulous! Featuring a new 2 in 1 vacuum, you can remove the small vacuum for small "clean-ups" or attach the small vac back in to the base for traditional vacuum play! A pretty twinkling bow will light the way as you clean, while the pearly beads in the see- through canister swirl & whirl around as you go! Looks and sounds just like the real thing! Contains lights and realistic sounds. Batteries included.​​
feature_bullets: Minnie Mouse's Twinkle Bows Vacuum makes cleaning not only fun, but fabulous! Featuring a new 2 in 1 vacuum, you can remove the small vacuum for small "clean-ups" or attach the small vac back in to the base for traditional vacuum play! A pretty twinkling bow will light the way as you clean, while the pearly beads in the see- through canister swirl & whirl around as you go! Looks and sounds just like the real thing! Contains lights and realistic sounds. Batteries included.​​
